name.name: Name
name.description: A friendly name for the device

owner_id.name: Owner ID
owner_id.description: The ID of the user object that 'owns' the device

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.description: Determines if the device is currently enabled

outbound_flags.name: Outbound Flags
outbound_flags.description: List of flags (features) this device requires when making outbound calls

internal.description: The default caller ID used when dialing internal extensions

name.description: The caller id name for the object type

emergency.description: The caller ID used when external, internal, or emergency is not defined

name.name: Caller ID Emergency Name
name.description: The caller id name for the object type

caller_id_options.description: The caller ID option parameters for the device

reformat.name: Caller ID Reformat
reformat.description: A regular expression that if can reformat the displayed caller id

ringtones.description: The ringtones used for external and internal calls

external.name: External Ringtones
external.description: The alert info SIP header added when the call is from external sources

internal.name: Internal Ringtones

media.description: The media parameters for the device

ignore_early_media.name: Ignore Early Media
ignore_early_media.description: The option to determine if early media from the device should always be ignored

progress_timeout.name: Progress Timeout
progress_timeout.description: The progress timeout to apply to the device

codecs.name: Audio Codecs
codecs.description: A list of audio codecs to use

codecs.name: Video Codecs
codecs.description: A list of video codecs to use

music_on_hold.description: The device music on hold parameters

media_id.name: Music On Hold (ID)
media_id.description: The ID of a media object that should be used as the device music on hold

enabled.name: Enabled (call forward)
enabled.description: Determines if the call forwarding should be used

number.name: Number (call forward)
number.description: The number to forward calls to

substitute.name: Substitute (call forward)
substitute.description: Determines if the call forwarding replaces the device

require_keypress.name: Require Kyepress (call forward)
require_keypress.description: Determines if the callee is prompted to press 1 to accept the call

keep_caller_id.name: Keep Caller ID (call forward)
keep_caller_id.description: Determines if the caller id is kept when the call is forwarded, if not the devices caller id is used

direct_calls_only.name: Direct Calls Only (call forward)
direct_calls_only.description: Determines if the calls that are not directly sent to the device should be forwarded

ignore_early_media.name: Ignore Early Media (call forward)
ignore_early_media.description: The option to determine if early media from the call forwarded number should ignored

username.name: Skype Username
username.description: Skype Username to connect with via Skype

realm.name: Realm (sip)
realm.description: The realm this device should use, overriding the account realm

route.name: Route (sip)
route.description: The SIP URL used if the invite format is 'route'

number.name: Number (sip)
number.description: The number used if the invite format is 1npan, npan, or e164 (if not set the dialed number is used)

static_route.name: Static Route
static_route.description: Sends all inbound calls to this string (instead of dialed number or username)

registration_expiration.name: Registration Expiration (sip)
registration_expiration.description: The time, in seconds, to force registrations to expire
